title: Department of Unreality Hub
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:minimalist-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --header-title: "Department of Unreality";
     --header-subtitle: "Making the Unreal a ㅤㅤㅤㅤ";
     --lgurl: url('http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/unreality-hub/Unreality%20Header%20Logo.svg');
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Department of Unreality Hub**
**Author:** [[*user Fishish]]
**Author Page!** [[[fishishpage | Fishish's Author Page]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Dear [Name],

It is my pleasure to welcome you to [Department Name.] You have been chosen from amongst your peers for your [Relevant work experience.] and [Positive personal quality.] 

The Department handles a very specific subset of anomalous phenomena affecting [Relevant Information concerning the Department.]

[Additional paragraphs detailing relevant duties covered by the Department.]

Regards,

John Doe
Department of Unreality
Director
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
+ [CLICK TO EDIT TEXT]
//The building blocks of deconstruction.//
//(Ordered Chronologically.)//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[unreality-orientation | The Afternoon (Department of Unreality Orientation)]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

//I grab a bagel and head out into Site-19.//
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[your-imaginary-friend | Your Imaginary Friend]]] – by [[*user Fishish]] and [[*user Deadly Bread]].

//Slowly, I try solving a puzzle with no real pieces.//
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[something-glowing | Something Glowing]]] – By [[*user Deadly Bread]].

//all ancillary functions will be moved to preventing subjective reality loss during this process.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[the-castaway-from-unreality | The Castaway From Unreality]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

//In the time I've been at Site-19, I've done maybe one or two things that could be considered actual work.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[its-not-real-it-never-was-you-pathetic-fools | It's Not Real, It Never Was, You Pathetic Fools]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

//Material Requirements: Nothing. (Already in my possession)//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6208 | SCP-6208 - Amnesia Was Her Name]]] – by [[*user Elunerazim]] and [[*user Fishish]].

//Foundation staff are to be made aware of the existence of the SCP Foundation Department of Unreality.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6938|SCP-6938 – Alex Thorley Gets A Gift Horse]]] – by [[*user Uncle Nicolini]] and [[*user Fishish]].

//"Any objections?"//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[haunt-me | Haunt Me, Haunt Me, Haunt Me]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

//The morning sun hates you, and everything hurts.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[disintegration | Disintegration]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

**[02.39 AM] -- Alex Thorley:**  I'm scared of blood.
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[unreality-hub | SCP-001-NULL - Fishish’s Proposal]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

//We'll meet again. Same as it ever was.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

@@@@

= **Site-19 Cafeteria**

//O.R. #: 000000 @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ Guest: 7
Cashier: N/A @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ 18:24:30 PM
13/02/2021//

-----

1 Plain Bagel 1.75

1 D Water bottle 0.99

-----

//Subtotal 2.74
12% VAT 0.32//

**Amount Due: 3.06**

[[=]]
> + Running on Empty
> //Standalone tales featuring the Department of Unreality (singular).//

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[burger | Alex Thorley Eats A Burger]]] – by [[*user syuzhet]].

//The smell of cooked meat, the taste of it on your tongue, the soft fat oozing from between the edges of your teeth.//

//It's a nice thing to be able to eat real food for once.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[/bagel|Alex Thorley Hungers For a Bagel]]] – by [[*user JakdragonX]].

//Oh, speaking of feeling things: I'm still hungry.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[unreal sushi| alex thorley dreams of sushi.]]] – by [[*user LORDXVNV]].

//You would expect an ocean this big to have actual waves, but it's just ripples. They're just there. They'll never crash onto the shore. There won't ever be a climax.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[the-blank-page | The Blank Page]]] – by [[*user Prismal]].

//You stare at the empty page, scared.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[a-thorley-little-christmas | Alex Thorley's Christmas Special]]] – by [[*user FLOORBOARDS]].

//After [Period of time of employment.] we are [Sad/relived/excited.] to see you go. Your transfer from [Insert former Department here.] to [Insert current Department here.] has been approved. We are thankful you have continued to dutifully serve the Foundation in our mission.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[alex-thorley-goes-on-a-blind-date| Alex Thorley Goes on a Blind Date]]] – by [[*user IronShears]].

//You are Alex Thorley. You have been waiting for 30 minutes.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[give-me-back-to-the-sky |Give me Back to the Sky]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

//You have never felt better, which makes you nauseous.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[poem |Alex Thorley Writes A Poem]]] – by [[*user IndustryStandard]].

//You don't need to know your hands // if you do no work.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[illcovetyouifyoucoverme |ILLCOVETYOUIFYOUCOVERME]]] – by [[*user FLOORBOARDS]].

//**Kindness:** But the defense of love remains where it was: Standing on the bastion of the night, overlooking the red dawn where one day the sky will be painted with yellow stars as well.//

//[**Donald John Trump** exits from behind the podium. He smiles widely and repeatedly bows. He waves both his hands. He looks back and forth.]//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[sundial|Sundial]]] – by [[*user Aftokrator]].

//What is the inverse of a human being?//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[magazine|Maga zine]]] – by [[*user Prismal]].

//Open?//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[drama|Alex Thorley in A Dramatic Irony]]] – by [[*user Cyvstvi]].

//**ALEX THORLEY**//
@@    @@//I’m just going through the motions. That’s all.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[alex-thorley-confuses-a-guy|Alex Thorley Confuses a Guy]]] – by [[*user Kothardarastrix]].

//"I don’t not do anything."//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[baroque-unreality|**BAROQUE**]]] – by [[*user Fishish]].

//How this make u feel white boy//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[Scatterbrained|scatterbrained.]]] – by [[*user Troutmaskreplica]].

//god, what am i doing?//

[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@
-----
@@ @@

@@ @@

> + [ACCESS DENIED]
> //Standalone SCPs involving the Department of Unreality (plural).//

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[scp-5863|SCP-5863 – Myths Made Plain]]] – by [[*user SynthPanda_]].

//The nature of SCP-5863 is currently unknown to the Foundation. The following proposed explanations are currently under investigation.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[scp-0983 | SCP-983 – The Party is Today]]] – by [[*user FLOORBOARDS]].

//I can't keep pretending these aren't presents from myself.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[scp-6478|SCP-6478 – Not Dementia - It's Something Else]]] – by [[*user Quicksilvers ]].

//The results and side effects of ingesting SCP-6478-1 are inconclusive.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6558|SCP-6558 – Word Disassociation]]] – by [[*user tstaffor]].

//**Special Containment Procedures:** Containment.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7591|SCP-7591 – Alex Thorley Kills A Guy]]] – by [[*user PlaguePJP]].

//**Lague:** Have you ever had violent thoughts?//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7195|SCP-7195 – Alex Thorley Gets A Cat]]] – by [[*user Prismal]].

//Thorley meows.//

//SCP-7195 meows.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7356|SCP-7356 – Noncanonical Materials]]] – by [[*user FLOORBOARDS]].

//Those in the presence of SCP-7356 have not reported adverse effects. However, assigned ritualists — even those who had been amnesticized — have reported experiencing dreams depicting an unknown species of bird, possibly a crow or raven, gliding down a hallway.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7365|SCP-7365 – Take/Off/Day]]] – by [[*user IndustryStandard]].

//Congratulations! You have won (earned) a complementary, all-expenses-paid, trip around the world!//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6352|SCP-6352 – Mother Died Today]]] – by [[*user fabuIa]].

//You are not a member of the Department of Unreality. This does not concern you.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7488|SCP-7488 – anything for your eyes]]] – by [[*user winkwonkboi]].

//They all died, screaming. SCP-7488 wields a gun. The bullets are painted in kaleidoscopic hues.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7413|SCP-7413 – Rhizomatic Serial Killer]]] – by [[*user FLOORBOARDS]].

//Several calls were made to the police precinct of northern ████████, ██████, USA, in which a low, androgynous voice stated "there is a killer on the loose" before hanging up.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8993|SCP-8993 – embody]]] – by [[*user SynthPanda_]].

//While the SCP-8993 CORE will regain what was lost, it will never regain its shape.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8591|SCP-8591 ⁠— Alex Thorley Doesn’t Get Away With It]]] – by [[*user PlaguePJP]].

**Thorley:** //(On the phone)// It’s here again.
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8195|SCP-8195 ⁠— Alex Thorley Gets Away With It]]] – by [[*user Syuzhet]].

**Thorley:** //(On the phone)// Yeah, no, that's okay.
**Thorley:** Like... chicken? No, that's fine. Just get that one instead.
**Thorley:** Yep.
**Thorley:** No, really, it's   it's okay. We'll talk about it later, okay?
**Thorley:**
**Thorley:** Love you, bye.
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7646|SCP-7646 ⁠— Alex Thorley is Implicated in the DuPont Teflon Scandal]]] – by [[*user Billith]].

//The consequences of SCP-7646's existence, as well as the existence of similar events, are to be ameliorated in perpetuity by the ongoing efforts of **OPERATION ALEX THORLEY DRINKS 700+ GLASSES OF WATER**.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8797|SCP-8797— The Collected Works of Alex Thorley]]] – by [[*user Tufto]].
//SCP-8797 has been discontinued as a result of reader disinterest. We thank you for your interest in [publishing company] and encourage you to check out our works by other authors, such as://
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7825|SCP-7825 — Thorley Minus Thorley]]] – by [[*user troutmaskreplica]].
//**Special Containment Procedures:** Alex Thorley is the sole individual responsible for the research and containment of SCP-7825.//
[[/div]]
@@ @@

> + NULLISOMY
> //A veces dejo de respirar por un instante..//

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-cn-2186  SCP-CN-2186 - Alex Thorley每次回办公室都看到同事在装死] – by [[*user sjx07]].

//Alex Thorley had died at Alex Thorley's hands a few times, but Alex Thorley was still alive, still writing this document, still able to kill Alex Thorley if they so wished.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-031-VN | SCP-031-VN - Listen To The Whispers Of The Unreals]]] – by [[*user Welpermander]].

//**[DATA IRRELEVANT]:** Unreality is so basic, so easy to comprehend. You are but a burden to everyone. Nobody here is not disappointed with you.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-ZH-161 |SCP-ZH-161 - Alex Thorley Works From 9 To 5]]] – by [[*user Kikunai]].

//Special Containment Procedure: Currently, the whereabouts of Unreality Department liaison Alex Thorley should be identified and located.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/french-fries-without-ketchup###| Alex Thorley品尝薯条时不蘸番茄酱]  by [[*user blackinblack]]. **— NOT TRANSLATED [CN]**

//这封信是一份指南，指引你在这个全基金会最安全的尸坑里拯救自己免于成为他人餐桌上的寿司。//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/want-a-glass-of-water| Alex Thorley想要一杯水]  by [[*user Turpentine]]. **— NOT TRANSLATED [CN]**

//你没法呼吸，没法用一个装着薯条的肺呼吸。现代医学称这种情况为“条状马铃薯肺部沉积症”，又称“薯条肺”。//

[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ What is this? 
[[/=]]

--Nice try Officer.--

The Department of Unreality is a Foundation department [[footnote]] Despite the protests of RAISA, the Ethics Committee, the department's own Reality Liaison, and the author. [[/footnote]] that handles a set of anomalous phenomena. You really have to not see it to believe it.

**[CLICK TO EDIT TEXT]** encompasses the original articles written by team //The Wiggles Hate Each Other in Real Life// for DEPARTMENTCON 2022, as well as a continuation by [[*user Fishish]].

Although the department is open to interpretation, only articles internally consistent with those articles already on the hub are eligible to be added to it. Please contact [[*user Fishish]] through either Wikidot PMs or Discord if you have any questions.



@@ @@

+ Writing Guide

[[collapsible show="+ Writing Guide" hide="- Close"]]

[[/collapsible]]

##transparent|It has to be good.##
##transparent|One of the rules, as a freebie: Alex Thorley is the only existing employee for the department.##

[[/=]]
